text: M3GAN 2.0 is an American science fiction horror movie. It is expected to be released on June 27, 2025 in North America. It was directed by Gerard Johnstone and produced by Jason Blum, James Wan, and Allison Williams. It is the sequel to the 2022 movie M3GAN. The movie is set two years after the events of the first movie. Gemma is now an author. A defense contractor attempts to make a robot called Amelia after stealing technology from M3GAN. Another M3GAN is created by Gemma so it can fight Amelia and stop it from taking over humanity. Principal photography for the movie started in Auckland, New Zealand on July 15, 2024 and ended on September 21. == Cast == * Allison Williams as Gemma * Violet McGraw as Cady * Amie Donald as M3GAN **Jenna Davis as the voice of M3GAN * Brian Jordan Alvarez as Cole * Jen Van Epps as Tess * Ivanna Sakhno as Amelia ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:2020s English-language movies Category:2025 movies Category:2020s science fiction horror movies Category:American satirical movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies about artificial intelligence Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about orphans Category:Movies set in Seattle Category:Movies set in Washington (state) Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Upcoming movies Category:Upcoming sequel movies
title: M3GAN 2.0
